message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $125?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate the discount. Would it be possible to lower the price further to $110?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated. How about we meet at $115?
